mapper.select: select count(*) from adv_user where dept_id = #{deptId};

select count(*) from adv_dept
and parent_id = #{parentId}
select count(*) from adv_dept where dept_name = #{deptName};
select IFNULL(MAX(order_num),0) from adv_dept where parent_id=#{parentId};

mapper.update:
update adv_dept
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ancestors = #{ancestors,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
leader = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = sysdate(),
where dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update adv_dept set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ancestors = #{ancestors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leader = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = sysdate() where dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
